org.richfaces.application.push

Interface Topic

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTopic, TopicImpl

    public interface Topic

    Topic encapsulates particular endpoint for sending/receiving messages.

    It is associated with TopicKey and in current implementation several Topic instances can be associated with the particular JMS Topic.

    Topic holds collection of TopicListener and one MessageDataSerializer.

    Author:
    Nick Belaevski

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Publish data to the subscribed clients

      • publish

        void publish(Object messageData,
           String subtopicName)
             throws MessageException
        Publish data to the subscribed clients
        Parameters:
        messageData - data that will be serialized by MessageDataSerializer
        subtopicName - optional subtopic, used to publish to clients that are only interested in specific subtopics
        Throws:
        MessageException
